label: SocketSync Bluetooth Gateway
description: SocketSync Bluetooth Gateway is designed based on BLE and LoRa technology. With the advanced LoRa technology and built-in BLE module, the BLE gateway receives and reports the Bluetooth devices messages to the LoRaWAN gateway. The parameter settings, such as the heartbeat period, LoRaWAN work mode, and sensor data to send in a Bluetooth message, are adjustable as per customersâ€™ requirements.
